question: You have recently been on a vacation in a foreign country and stayed at a home-stay, you have realised that you have misplaced an expensive wristwatch and cannot find it.Write a letter to the family you stayed with. In your letter:Give details of your stayDescribe your wristwatchIf found how they could return it to you.
text: Hope you're doing well since we last met a few weeks ago. I am penning down this letter to let you know that I lost my wristwatch during my tenure in Canada.

I, Priya , stayed at your residence 2 weeks before and I'm from London. Hope you recognized me, I had a great time at your homestay. After my vacation, I returned back to Canada and realized that my wristwatch was missing whereas the rest of my belongings were intact. Although  I am aware that it's my dad's gift to me on my birthday, I take little care of it. It's a golden-coloured watch with a black dial of size 35mm. If I had checked it earlier before leaving your home-stay, I would have found it.

I am pleading with you both to check in my room , where I stayed , which is suite 202. I'd kept my belongings in the cupboard next to the laundry room. I'm assuming that I might have left it there, while picking up other items. Therefore, If you're able to locate my watch , please send it to the enclosed address. I'll pay the charges for the mailing.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you have an unnecessary comma before the dependent clause marker while. Consider removing the comma.
